videos.headline: Osborn's 8-yard TD catch extends Buffalo lead
videos.description: Tyree Jackson scrambles out of the pocket and connects with K.J. Osborn for an 8-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Glass III connects with Banham for 75-yard TD
videos.description: Eastern Michigan cuts into Buffalo's lead with a 75-yard touchdown strike.
